Key Match Events: Joel Embiid shot 2-of-11 from the field
Paul George dropped a season-high 29 points, shooting 7-of-11 from three, and tallying 10 rebounds, three assists, three steals, and one block
Pre-Game Insights: Experts expected Joel Embiid to be rusty in his season debut
Coach Nick Nurse emphasized the importance of Joel Embiid's conditioning
Post-Match Reflections: Joel Embiid felt OK in his return to play, but was still extremely rusty
Head coach Nick Nurse said Joel Embiid was certainly rusty, but played with some pretty good competitive spirit
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Philadelphia 76ers lost to the New York Knicks 111-99
Joel Embiid played 26 minutes of action unscathed
The team is 2-8, only ahead of Toronto in the Eastern Conference
Others: Joel Embiid and Paul George played together for the first time
Joel Embiid spoke about how he's still trying to figure out the best way to help the team
